document.full_text: the bribery scandal that has already tarnished fifa's reputation and thrown next week's presidential election into disarray has become even more tangled, with the most powerful man in soccer ' sepp blatter ' now accused of corruption.
document.title: fifa chief to be investigated for bribes
lines_and_colors: the bribery scandal that has already tarnished fifa's reputation and thrown next week's presidential election into disarray has become even more tangled, with the most powerful man in soccer ' sepp blatter ' now accused of corruption.
